TopicTitle: Using Extra Small Decouplers on top of Extra Small square Trusses Causes Early Disassembly on Stage 2

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3.1 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 | CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 6-Core Processor | GPU: NVIDIA GeFore RTX 3060 | RAM: 15.93 GB

 

Just as the title says. This is highly repeatable and has happened every time I have tried.
